jd_information.description: TALENT HUNTERS ARE HIRING FOR TOURS AND TRAVEL COMPANYPosition:-Conceptualizer Creative· Event Management Background· Any Graduate would do· At least 6+ yrs· Fort Location- Department Bharat Deko (Domestic)· Salary is open. • To interact with clients to ensure clarity in Brief if required. . Attend Client meetings with Sales team to discuss the concept . • Should have the experience of working on briefs given by the client from scratch. • Work in tandem with Client Service / BD / Operations team to develop new ideas and concepts as part of the marketing strategy. • Develop communication & out of Box ideas/concept, in sync with Operations & Creative team to bring the ideas to reality • To conceive & develop fresh and practical ideas for Activation's & Events with the latest technologies and networks for communication. • Work closely with the Design Team to take the concept to the next level and aid in its visualization process IF YOU FIND THIS JOB SUITABLE TO YOU, CAN SEND ME YOUR CV ON THE GIVEN EMAIL ID thmumbai@yahoo.co.in or you can call me on this number 887996786Regards,madhuriTalent Hunters
